page.title: 19TOURISM,CARSPHAIRN
page.content: The area around Carsphairn is ideal for tourists.There is{fishing}on the River Deugh,hills for those who are interested in {walking}and the beautiful scenery all round.The area is rich in{history,}with ancient burial sites, deserted villages, standing stones,a disused lead mine, the site of the house where John Loudon MacAdam(the road builder) used to spend his holidays as a child. Nearby is the stretch of road where he first tested his new invention _ tar. In the fields near the village can be found Welsh and Highland cattle,as well as the native Galloways.The village itself has a restaurant,an hotel and a shop.
